SEO_DESCRIPTION: Web developer working with startups and creative projects with care and immersion. From conceptualization to user experience; and beyond.

HEADER.LOGO: Return to Diego de Sousa's homepage

HERO.H1: My name is Diego, I'm a frontend developer specializing in accessible, interactive, and fast websites.

ABOUTSECTION.CONTENT:
When I was 12, my dad brought home a computer that he could no longer use at work. They told me that if I broke it, I would lose it. A few days later, it was 'broken'. I managed to fix and break it over and over again. That was the start of my relationship with the digital world.

Graphic Designer by training, developer by vocation. I believe my greatest strength lies at the intersection, understanding the importance of design and translating it into an optimal user experience.

In recent years, I have focused on accessible, creative, and high-performance projects.

I work as a freelancer with end clients, studios, agencies, and companies creating creative websites and web applications; while also working on my personal projects.

FORM.HELP_PLACEHOLDER: web design, developing my design, online store, etc.
